ygData.subject: Re: Stein of Moggok Bug
ygData.msgSnippet: I know there was a bug along these lines, but Verant claimed they had it fixed. Basically, if you were charmed, non-weapons you had equipped in your primary
ygData.messageBody:
I know there was a bug along these lines, but Verant
claimed they had it fixed. Basically, if you were
charmed, non-weapons you had equipped in your primary
hand would, at times, mutate like this. If you managed
to escape, you could prove it had happened due to a
bug, since you'd have something un-equippable (like,
say, an Emerald) equipped.

If this was recent (i.e. past couple of weeks), I'd
definitely /bug it.

--- Gregory Egan <gemd@...> wrote:
> Ok, has this happened to anyone else? I died and
> when I went to loot my corpse my Stein of Moggok had
> mutated into Chitin Shell Armor. Not quite an
> equitible trade. I petitioned a GM, who at least
> answered quickly, but his advice was to sell the
> armor for a new stein, as if they were of equal
> value. No other help or advice offered (surprise,
> surprise). Bought a new stein and sold armor for a
> loss of almost 200 pp. Anyway, is this a known bug?
> I will petition EQbugs@..., but don't expect
> help there either.
>
> Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
>
